lines.text: Columbia Presbyterian, but he begged me not to tell you.
He tells you, but he doesn't tell me, his best friend. I guess he doesn't want to worry me.
[Felix is upset that his daughter's fiance has been twice divorced.]
The man's been divorced twice, Oscar.
Be careful, Felix. A lot of people have been divorced. Jeannie was divorced, you're divorced.
Well, I wouldn't want my daughter to marry you either.
No kidding, I just had my throat circumcised!

[Looking over Oscar's apartment, which is messy as expected, and see it]
A motorcycle?
It's not mine. A guy is storing it here. You know how expensive it is to store anything in this city? Charged him half the price.
